title: Design and Operational Strategies for Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational online learning experience and comprehension of language education theories
context.additional_context: A graduate-level course enhancing MOOC design and operational capabilities in language fields. Focuses on learner-customized content creation and assessment tool utilization

learning_goals: Explain MOOC design principles: content organization, interaction strategies, and assessment systems.
Create a language education module using an LMS-based asynchronous learning environment.
Develop and apply formative assessment materials through learner engagement analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
